casebody.data:
No. 52,

Misc.

Wells, Administratrix, v. Simonds Abrasive Co. Henry S. Drinker, Charles J. Biddle and Francis Hop-kinson for petitioner. Philip Price for respondent.

C. A. 3d Cir. Certiorari granted limited to question No. 2 presented by the petition for the writ, i. e.:

“Does not the Pennsylvania Statute, as construed by the Court below, violate the Full Faith and Credit Clause of the United States Constitution?”
